Summary: 2 giant red fire like lights hover in the sky directly above people line outside staining at the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsWent outside with mother while she smoked cigarette and the hugest red lights looking as if they were almost on fire appeared directly above and ho ered over us we bolted inside and went to look out the window but couldn't see it we went back out seconds later to watch it and there were people directly across the street from us staring into the sky as well shocked at the lights my main concern was is this bombs flying over us? Is this a ufo? Is this huge thing going to hit is? When we went back out it was gone,and it must have been gone when we were insid strying to look for it thru the windows as well but it was very high in the sky..yet looked huge still just sat there...2 separate huge red lights with almost fiery looking edges
